title: Bobby Hosted The Show ‘Holiday’ Party + Listener Caught Her Boyfriend Cheating From A Board Game + Draft Championship Belt Winner Announced
itunes:title: Bobby Hosted The Show ‘Holiday’ Party + Listener Caught Her Boyfriend Cheating From A Board Game + Draft Championship Belt Winner Announced
description:
Bobby hosted the show’s holiday party last night so we get everyone’s thought including Bobby’s trick to get everyone to leave on time. A listener tells us how she caught her boyfriend cheating on accident over a board game. Also, we crown the winner of the Draft Championship belt!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
